title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
### Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid

**Product Overview:**
Dive into the world of Bakugan with the ultimate **Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid**! Designed for ages 6 and up, this deluxe playset is the perfect starter pack for both boys and girls, offering a customizable and interactive experience that brings the excitement of Bakugan battles to life.

**Key Features:**

- **Customizable Deluxe Arena:**
  - **Multi-Part Ball Linking System:** Easily customize and expand your arena with a unique ball-linking system.
  - **Built-in Phone Holder:** Keep your phone or tablet within easy reach while you play.
  - **Sparring Totem:** Included to enhance your battle experience.
  - **Roll and Display Base:** Watch your Bakugan transform when rolled on gate cards.

- **Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid:**
  - **Action Figure with Spinning Feature:** This special attack Dragonoid can spin and battle with a ripcord for added excitement.
  - **XL Rip Cord:** Included for powerful launches.

- **Comprehensive Playset Contents:**
  - 1 Deluxe Arena
  - 1 Special Attack Bakugan
  - 2 Clan Flags
  - 3 Sparring Totem
  - 1 Character Card
  - 1 Special Attack Card
  - 2 Gate Card
  - 1 XL Rip Cord
  - 1 Bakugan Token

- **Upgradeable and Collectible:**
  - **Upgradeable with Training Sets:** Expand your arena with additional training sets (sold separately).
  - **Collect to Customize:** Collect different Bakugan and battle packs to create unique battle scenarios.

- **Official Bakugan Product:**
  - **Spin Master Care Commitment:** Quality and safety guaranteed by Spin Master.
  - **Roblox Online Game Code Included:** Unlock exclusive content in Roblox with the special code provided.

**Ideal For:**
- Boys and girls aged 6 and up
- Bakugan enthusiasts
- Collectors looking for exclusive variants and battle packs

**Why Choose This Playset?**
- **Interactive and Engaging:** The customizable arena and spinning action figures provide endless hours of fun.
- **Expandable:** Easily upgrade your playset with additional training sets.
- **Collectible:** Special attack variants and battle packs add a unique twist to your collection.
- **Official and Trusted:** Backed by Spin Master's commitment to quality and safety.

**Get ready to unleash the power of the Special Attack Dragonoid and dominate the battlefield with the Bakugan Battle Arena!**
